name: There and Back (GameDev Tutorials)
description:
In This Game You Switch Between Two Characters (The Human and the Drone). The Player is Stuck in a Building and is Controlling the Drone to Get Him Supplies like Food, Weapons, and Other Supplies. The Catch is that you are in a Zombie Apocalypse, you the Human are Trying to Survive as Long as Possible.

CREDITS: 

Code by: Me

Art by: PNGKey

Music by: Doug Maxwell/Media Right Productions

Sound Effects by: Me
